Name: is included (contract)
Documentation: - Subclasses of the portfolio filter override isIncluded to provide their specific behaviors.

Name: select contracts (collection of contracts)
Documentation:
- The select operation on the portfolio filter takes a collection of contracts and returns another collection of contracts
- For each contract in the input collection, the select operation evaluates isIncluded and, if true, adds it to the result.

Name: value (scenario)
Documentation:
- позволяет рассчитать ценность всего пакета целиком 
- в простом случае равен сумме всех входящих контрактов

Name: bid
Documentation: - the price to buy (the bid предложение цены)

Name: calculated scenario element
Documentation:
- calculation from other prices or market characteristics
- In this case the calculated scenario element has a list of scenario elements as arguments and a formula

Name: contract filter
Documentation: This allows us to use the contract selector for simple cases

Name: cross rate scenario element
Documentation: If we know the exchange rates for USD/DEM and for USD/GBP, then we can calculate the exchange rate for GBP/DEM as (USD/DEM) / (USD/GBP).

Name: formula
Documentation: We can build an interpreter [1] that recognizes a simple range of formulaic expressions. This technique is familiar to any user who has used spreadsheets

Name: hard coded filter
Documentation: use a range of hard-coded fiiters for more complex situations.

Name: information source
Documentation: Typically these instructions come from a source, such as Reuters, that tells where to look for information (for example, "Page 3, second column of the row starting IBM")

Name: instrument
Documentation: all instruments are exchange rates

Name: long [derived]
Documentation: buyer

Name: market indicator
Documentation: -  market indicator as a supertype of instrument. This reflects the fact that scenarios can contain things other than instruments (for example, a market indicator includes volatilities, as well as all instruments)

Name: offer
Documentation: -  the price to sell (the offer).

Name: portfolio
Documentation:
- portfolio is a collection of contracts
- A portfolio is a collection of contracts that can be valued as a whole.
- Portfolios are commonly formed from a number of properties of contracts, including counterparty, dealer (the primary party), instrument, and dates of the deal

- Portfolios can be transient or persistent.

Name: portfolio filter
Documentation:
pattern strategy:
мы можем выбрать любой фильтр
-  filter is only used for selection purposes.
-We can easily add other portfolio filters.
- - This allows us to use the contract selector for simple cases and use a range of hard-coded fiiters for more complex situations.

Name: quote
Documentation:
- котировка
-  quote is a fundamental type

Name: scenario
Documentation: - The scenario represents the state of the market at a certain point in time, and the elements within the scenario represent the prices at that point

Name: short [derived]
Documentation: seller

Name: sourced scenario element
Documentation: origins of a price: publication by some body that is widely quoted in the market,

Name: spread
Documentation: - spread—the difference between the bid and the offer

Name: timepoint
Documentation: We need to be able to show how prices can change over time and to keep a history of those changes

Name: call , and add to result if yes
